title: The New Path: My Life with Paramhansa Yogananda
description: An in-depth account, written by a direct disciple, of what it was like to live with the world teacher, Paramhansa Yogananda-author of the classic, Autobiography of a Yogi. This newly revised and expanded edition of this life-changing book commemorates Swami Kriyananda's 60th year of discipleship to Yogananda. It includes a new cover and introduction, and special sections not published in the original.
author: Kriyananda
